Itemized Passive Description:
*Basic effect(s)*
- ATK & DEF 160%{passiveImg:up_g}
*Per "Universe 6" or "Peppy Gals" Category ally on the team*
- ATK, DEF & chance of evading enemy's attack 8%{passiveImg:up_g}
*When there is a "Universe Survival Saga" or "Pure Saiyans"
Category enemy*
- Evades enemy's attack
*When 6 or more "Universe 6" Category allies are on the
team*
- All allies' ATK 16%{passiveImg:up_g} for 2 turn(s) after the character evades
6 or more attacks in battle
*When there is an ally whose name includes "Kale" attacking
in the same turn*
- ATK 160%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Launches an additional Super Attack

5309.superDescription:
Raises ATK & DEF, 
causes supreme damage to enemy 
and greatly lowers DEF
